#include<iostream>

int palin(int n){
int temp = 0;
int r = 0;
while (n >0){
temp = n / 10;
r =(r * 10) + n%10;
n = temp;
}
return r;
}

using namespace std;

int main (){
int cases = 0;
int n = 0;
int ctr = 0;
cin>>cases;
int op[cases];
while (cases-- > 0){
    cin>>n;
    n++;
    while (n != palin(n)){
        n++;
    }
    op[ctr] = (n);
    ctr++;
}
for (int i = 0 ; i <ctr ;i++){
    cout<<op[i]<<endl;
}
return 0;
}
